Interface Input

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibgdxInput

    public interface Input

    • Method Detail

      • setInputProcessor

        void setInputProcessor(org.mini2Dx.gdx.InputProcessor inputProcessor)
        Sets the InputProcessor for handling mouse/keyboard/touch events
        Parameters:
        inputProcessor - The InputProcessor to use

      • setOnScreenKeyboardVisible

        void setOnScreenKeyboardVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets on mobile and consoles of the on-screen keyboard should appear
        Parameters:
        visible - True if the keyboard should appear

      • getGamePads

        org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Array<GamePad> getGamePads()
        Returns the list of known GamePads connected to the device. If a GamePad disconnects/unplugs it will remain in this array.
        Returns:
        An empty Array if no GamePads are present.

      • newPS4GamePad

        PS4GamePad newPS4GamePad(GamePad gamePad)
        Wraps a GamePad as a PS4GamePad
        Parameters:
        gamePad - The underlying GamePad instance
        Returns:
        A new instance of PS4GamePad

      • isKeyJustPressed

        boolean isKeyJustPressed(int key)
        Returns if a keyboard key was just pressed (down, then released)
        Parameters:
        key - The keyboard keycode
        Returns:
        True if the key was just pressed (down, then released)

      • isKeyDown

        boolean isKeyDown(int key)
        Returns if a keyboard key is down
        Parameters:
        key - The keyboard keycode
        Returns:
        True if the key is down

      • isKeyUp

        boolean isKeyUp(int key)
        Returns if a keyboard key is up
        Parameters:
        key - The keyboard keycode
        Returns:
        True if the key is down

      • justTouched

        boolean justTouched()
        Returns if the the screen was just touched or the mouse was just clicked
        Returns:
        True if the screen was touched or mouse button pressed down then released
